name: Special Education - Special Olympics Education Programs
objective: This program promotes the expansion of Special Olympics and the design and implementation of Special Olympics education programs.
sub_agency_name: Office of Special Education and Rehabilitative Services
applicant_types: Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: 3(a), Special Olympics Sport and Empowerment Act of 2004. 42 U.S.C. § 15001.

rules_regulations: 34 CFR Part 300; 34 CFR Parts 75, 77, 79, 81, 82, and 86; and 2 CFR Part 200.
